item.title: How sharks swim faster than you
item.author: Sotirios Karamitsos,
item.description: Scientists have discovered how sharks are able to swim faster than most other fish. Making use of an advanced imaging technique, they were able to examine how sharks swing and stiffen their tails to swim more efficiently. Sharks, like all fish, wag their tails to propel forward. However, sharks, â€¦
